nodes.text: Master of the Order of Revan
Master of the Order of Revan, also called The Master, was a title used to denote the leader of the Order of Revan.

The title of Master of the Order of Revan existed since Decades before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Empire. It was created by the female human Sith Tari Darkspanner when she created the Order of Revan to attempt to balance the Empire between the Dark side and the Light side of the Force.
As the Master of the Order, Darkspanner pretended to be male, using the guise of Revan and Revan's mask, only revealing herself to those who passed all of the Order's trials.
